TypeSignature.Value: public class DataGridViewBand : System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement, ICloneable, IDisposable
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridViewBand extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement implements class System.ICloneable, class System.IDisposable
Public Class DataGridViewBand Inherits DataGridViewElement Implements ICloneable, IDisposable
public ref class DataGridViewBand : System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewElement, ICloneable, IDisposable

summary.span: 表示 控制項中項目的線性集合。

span.span: Represents a linear collection of elements in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表聯結在一起，可以為群組操作的寬線中的項目。The class represents elements joined together in a band that can be manipulated as a group. 每個項目通常是的執行個體或其衍生類別的其中一個。Each element is typically an instance of or one of its derived classes. 雖然相關聯的每個群組列中，標頭資料格不會被視為頻外的項目。Although a is associated with each band, header cells are not considered elements of the band. 是基底類別和類別。 is the base class of the and classes. 沒有針對沒有公用建構函式類型，因此存取頻外的唯一方式是透過資料行和資料列。There are no public constructors for the type, so the only way to access a band is through columns and rows in a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用管理群組中的資料格的內容。The following code example uses a to manipulate properties of groups of cells in a . [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewBandDemo.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewBandDemo.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewbanddemo.vb#0)]

summary.span: 建立與這個群組列完全相同的複本。

span.span: Creates an exact copy of this band.
An that represents the cloned .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要複製的資料列或資料格的資料行使用這個方法。Use this method to duplicate a row or column of cells.

para.span: 在覆寫衍生類別中呼叫基底類別的方法，讓基底類別的內容會複製到新的頻外，並確定也將複製的值加入至衍生類別的任何屬性。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new band, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

span.span: Gets or sets the shortcut menu for the band.
The associated with the current .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵在頻外的顯示區域，則會出現快顯功能表。The shortcut menu appears when a user clicks the right mouse button in the band's display area. 顯示區域是或中。The display area is a or in a . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性以新增功能的變更儲存格的背景色彩。The following code example uses the property of a to add functionality for changing a cell's background color. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得或設定群組列的預設儲存格樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the default cell style of the band.
The associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設儲存格樣式會套用至資料格沒有相關聯的樣式。The default cell style is applied to cells that do not have an associated style. 取得這個屬性，當預設值將會建立值如果不存在的預設儲存格樣式。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the default cell style does not exist. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定預設儲存格樣式中的第一個資料行。The following code example sets the default cell style for the first column in a . [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewBandDemo.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewBandDemo.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewbanddemo.vb#7)]

span.span: A that describes the run-time class of the object used as the default header cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性必須取得或設定的執行個體類別或其中一個衍生型別。This property must get or set an instance of the class or one of its derived types. 例如，類別會使用為預設標頭資料格類型。For example, the class uses a as the default header cell type. 同樣地，類別會使用。Similarly, the class uses a . 如果您使用自訂類型衍生自中的資料列或資料行，屬性必須設定為自訂類型。If you are using a custom type derived from in a row or column, the property must be set to the custom type.

exception.span: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值並不是表示 或衍生型別的 。

span.span: The specified value when setting this property is not a representing or a derived type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 釋出與這個群組列相關聯的資源。

span.span: Releases the resources associated with the band.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法覆寫 。This method overrides . 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理的呼叫所方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Finalize 方法和解構函式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3). 當記憶體回收行程所呼叫，這個方法會呼叫方法。When called by the garbage collector, this method calls the method.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出當使用者透過 捲動時，群組列是否會移動。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the band will move when a user scrolls through the .

value.span: 如果群組列不能從檢視位置捲動，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the band cannot be scrolled from view; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以儲存的重要資訊頻外就地當使用者捲動。This property can hold a band of important information in place when a user scrolls through the . 透過凍結的頻外將相鄰的已凍結的頻外。Bands adjacent to the frozen band will move over the frozen band. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會凍結資料行和資料列的儲存格的頻外。The following code example freezes a band of cells in a column and a row. 此範例也會變更指定哪些群組列會凍結凍結群組列的預設儲存格樣式。The example also changes the default cell style of the frozen bands to specify which bands are frozen. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewBandDemo.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewBandDemo.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewbanddemo.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得的值屬性自動產生新如果先前尚未存取屬性。Getting the value of the property automatically instantiates a new if the property has not previously been accessed. 因此，您必須使用屬性來判斷是否屬性設定為執行個體。You must, therefore, use the property to determine whether the property is currently set to a instance. 這可用來判斷哪一個物件的屬性所傳回屬性表示特別針對頻外的樣式。This is useful to determine which properties of the object returned by the property represent styles set specifically for the band. 如需儲存格樣式繼承的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

summary.span: 取得 控制項內群組列的相對位置。

span.span: Gets the relative position of the band within the control.

value.span: 中的群組列之以零起始的位置，或是包含它的 。

span.span: The zero-based position of the band in the or that it is contained within.

value.span: 預設值為 -1，表示沒有關聯的 控制項。

span.span: The default is -1, indicating that there is no associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值不會不一定會對應至集合中的寬線的目前可見位置。The value of this property does not necessarily correspond to the current visual position of the band within the collection. 比方說，如果使用者重新排列中的資料行在執行階段 (假設屬性設定為`true`)，值不會變更每個資料行的屬性。For example, if the user reorders columns in a at run time (assuming the property is set to `true`), the value of the property of each column will not change. 相反地，資料行值的變更。Instead, the column values change. 排序資料列，不過，並變更其值。Sorting rows, however, does change their values. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來設定資料行標籤。The following code example uses the property to set column labels. 頻外的透過存取屬性。The band's property is accessed through a . > [!NOTE] > 如果已啟用視覺化樣式，目前的主題會覆寫資料列和資料行標頭的顯示樣式屬性。If visual styles are enabled, the current theme overrides the display style properties for row and column headers. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#150](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#150)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#150](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#150)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#150](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#150)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的實作類別一律會傳回`null`因為這個基底類別不能包含項目。The implementation of this property in the class always returns `null` because this base class cannot contain elements. 如需樣式繼承的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會影響群組列中每個資料格的屬性。The property affects the property of each cell in the band. 例如，如果屬性變更，則資料列中的所有儲存格的屬性會變更。For example, if the property of a changes, then the property of all cells in the row will change. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性停用編輯整個。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to disable editing for an entire . 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以防止使用者藉由設定調整個別的資料列或資料行其屬性。You can prevent users from resizing individual rows or columns by setting their properties. 根據預設，屬性值根據資料行的屬性值和資料列的屬性值。By default, the property value is based on the property value for columns and the property value for rows. 如果您明確地設定至或，不過，則會忽略控制項值。If you explicitly set to or , however, the control value is ignored. 設定至還原繼承。Set to to restore the inheritance. 因為還原繼承的值，永遠不會傳回屬性值的資料列或資料行尚未加入至除非控制項。Because restores the value inheritance, the property will never return a value unless the row or column has not been added to a control. 如果您需要確定是否繼承的資料列或資料行的屬性值，請檢查其屬性。If you need to determine whether the property value of a row or column is inherited, check its property. 如果值包含旗標，不繼承屬性值。If the value includes the flag, the property value is not inherited. 如果屬性值是，使用者不能以手動方式調整寬線大小。If the property value is , the user will not be able to manually adjust band size. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性為預設值。The following code example sets the property to the default. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing/CPP/mousesizing.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing/CS/mousesizing.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing/VB/mousesizing.vb#14)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可儲存您想要關聯的頻外的任何物件的內容。The property can store any object that you want to associate with a band. 這個屬性通常用來儲存識別資訊，例如字串名稱，唯一的識別項 (例如， )，或在資料庫中的頻外的資料的索引。This property is typically used to store identifying information, such as a string name, a unique identifier (for example, a ), or the index of the band's data in a database. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用擷取設定的屬性來儲存更新的色彩屬性。The following code example uses the property to store a color that is later retrieved to set the property.
